text: Larry Morrow is an American serial entrepreneur and author.Alexis Carey,Nancy Parker, == Early life and education == Morrow is African-American by ethnicity and grew up in a Korean-American family in New Orleans, LA. He was raised by his mom and Korean grandmother who were both entrepreneurs. He attended St. Augustine High School and graduated from Bonnebel High. He also attended Tulane University but dropped out to support his family. == Career == Morrow started a career in New Orleans as an entrepreneur. He founded "Larry Morrow Events", an entertainment business platform that has featured celebrities such as Diddy, Floyd Mayweather, Drake, Rick Ross, Meek Mill and others.Richard Feloni and Sarah Wyman,Myelle Lansat and Richard Feloni, Morrow also launched "Larry Morrow Properties" and a New Orleans-based restaurant named "Morrow's".Nancy Parker, He wrote and published a self-help book captioned All Bets On Me – the Risks and Rewards of Becoming an Entrepreneur.Nancy Parker, == Awards and recognition == * 2018 - Black Enterprise - BeModern ManTyrus Townsend, * 2019 - Biz New Orleans - New & Notable AwardAshley McLellan, Kim Singletary, ==References== ==External links== * Larry Morrow Events website Category:African-American company founders Category:American company founders Category:Living people Category:American writers Category:Businesspeople from New Orleans Category:American people of Korean descent Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Larry Morrow
